content.description: Relative humidity is a measure, expressed as a percentage, of the amount of water vapor present in air. The following histogram summarizes the relative humidity, at noon, for a random sample of 100 days for a certain city.
content.question: Based on the histogram, which of the following is the best description of the distribution?

choices.label: The distribution displays a gap with a potential outlier located between 40% and 45%.
The distribution displays a gap with potential outliers located between 90% and 95%.
The distribution displays a gap with potential outliers located between 70% and 75%.
The distribution displays two clusters with no apparent outliers.

content.answer: The distribution displays a gap with a potential outlier located between 40% and 45%.

topic.text: 1.6: Describing the Distribution of a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
